12.name: Eric
12.help1:
"Eric is like the leader of the adventurers. She
casually brings them together. Her class is thief.
Quite busty. Single."
12.help2:
"She specializes in opening locks and detecting
traps, and supports the party in battle with
enhancement skills and follow-up attacks as a
support-type adventurer."
12.help3:
"If you bring her along, there shouldn't be any
issues in normal situations. However, if a
confrontation with a strong enemy is expected, it
might be better to organize adventurers more
geared towards combat."

13.name: Ma-kun
13.help1:
"Nickname Ma-kun, actually it's Mark. Aspiring to
be a warrior of the road. Somehow takes good care
of others, a 21-year-old who everyone relies on.
Currently in the midst of a booming career as an
adventurer."
13.help2:
"Skilled in both offense and defense, with high
stamina, he is a reliable vanguard. The <Round
Shield> reduces damage for the first few turns,
stabilizing the party's fighting strength."
13.help3:
"With the <Strength Potion>, he can also increase
his attack power. However, it seems that potion
comes out of his own pocket, and he often laments
about the heavy expenses."

14.name: Gurestorasu
14.help1:
"Gurestorasu is a magician who graduated from the
academy. She specializes in electromagnetic and
lightning magic, and became an adventurer to raise
funds for her research."
14.help2:
"His <Electromagnetic Storm> has high destructive
power, especially exhibiting the greatest power
against groups. The difficulty in reducing
lightning attribute damage is also an advantage."
14.help3:
"Furthermore, the <Acceleration> spell can charge
the active skills of all party members for one
turn. It's best to pair him with allies who have
skills with long charge times."

15.name: Faria
15.help1:
"Faria is a sister from the church in the slums.
She provides healing to the masses and decided to
become an adventurer to support the orphanage. By
the way, she is a half-elf."
15.help2:
"Among the adventurer sisters, she excels in
recovery. She will heal the party at the start of
battle and with active skills."
15.help3:
"She hardly does anything in terms of offense, but
even so, in prolonged explorations, having her
around will significantly reduce attrition."

16.name: Gomes
16.help1:
"Gomes, a former member of a bandit group that
originally operated in the nearby forest. However,
after the group was annihilated, he had a change
of heart and decided to live the life of an
adventurer. He's a typical rogue-type adventurer."
16.help2:
"In terms of combat, there's nothing particularly
noteworthy about him except for his high
endurance. He's just a regular troublemaker."
16.help3:
"However, he can perform unusual tactics such as
quickly finding more rewards after battles and
provoking enemies to induce anger."

17.name: Trendyル
17.help1:
"Trendyル is an elf who came to observe human
society. She has a carefree attitude and has been
traveling around, looking at various places. Her
class is a ranger, functioning as a scout and
archer."
17.help2:
"She excels in launching preemptive attacks with
her bow and shooting to restrain and hinder the
opponent's actions. Let's skillfully seal the
strong actions of formidable enemies."
17.help3:
"Also, while not as skilled as a thief, she is
somewhat capable of picking locks. A handy person
to have around, that's Trendyル for you."

18.name: Gildolf
18.help1:
"The traveling monk Gildolf is an exorcist monk
who serves the guardian god Ishperel. His
journey's purpose is to exterminate the impure
undead scattered throughout various places."
18.help2:
"His 'Banishment of the Dead' has a particularly
high effect on the undead, with a short charge
time. However, it has almost no effect on anything
other than the undead, so be careful."
18.help3:
"He can handle recovery spells to some extent, and
with 'Blessing,' he can increase the party's
attack power. Overall, he will contribute as an
anti-undead specialist."

19.name: Ivo
19.help1:
"Ivo, a warrior from the barbarian tribe. He
sought the battlefield, abandoned his homeland,
and was washed up to this land. He is not yet
accustomed to our culture, and his adventurer rank
is still low, but his strength is undeniable."
19.help2:
"He possesses tremendous strength and toughness,
pulverizing enemies with his large axe head-on. He
may be straightforward, but he is an extremely
reliable vanguard."
19.help3:
"However, on the flip side, he can only engage in
direct physical confrontations. For opponents
immune to physical attacks, let's have our allies
provide support effectively."

20.name: Frey
20.help1:
"Frey is a monk who has trained as a monk. She is
a carefree girl who became an adventurer after
becoming tired of the ascetic life and running
away from the temple."
20.help2:
"Through her accumulated training, her fists and
feet are enveloped in flames, allowing for
elemental attacks. Additionally, she has
resistance against elemental attacks depending on
her mood."
20.help3:
"And her trump card is the <Penetrating Flame
Palm>, which temporarily lowers the enemy's fire
resistance. After hitting with this, let's burn
them with a Dragon Breath or something similar."

21.name: Gustav
21.help1:
"Gustav was a gunsmith and engineer from the dwarf
village. After his village was destroyed in a war,
he became an adventurer, using his knowledge and
skills to make a living."
21.help2:
"His main weapon, the <Dragon's Breath> cannon,
has a special attack against flying enemies. With
this, he can deal significant damage even to
flying dragons."
21.help3:
"Furthermore, he has a deep understanding of
artifacts, and his charge amount and charge time
are also enhanced. If you are going to use
artifacts as your main focus, he can be considered
essential."

22.name: Dorawken
22.help1:
"Dorawken is a wandering knight who continues his
journey with his partner griffin, 'Stoner.' His
resounding fame is sung in numerous heroic tales."
22.help2:
"Charging into battle on Stoner truly shines in
group battles. I can easily scatter the rabble of
soldiers."
22.help3:
"Furthermore, Stoner's roar plunges the masses
into fear. A griffin raging in the battlefield is
more terrifying than anything else."

23.name: Elsie
23.help1:
"Elsie is a sister who was raised in an orphanage,
and she became an adventurer as a devout follower
of the war god Auld, determined to heal those
wounded in battle."
23.help2:
"The war god Auld, whom she worships, inspires
fighters. The <Blessing of the War God> can heal
wounds and at the same time increase attack
power."
23.help3:
"She has also mastered indispensable spells for
combat support such as <Holy Barrier> and
<Emergency Healing>. It would be good to bring her
along when facing formidable enemies."

24.name: Bain
24.help1:
"Bain is a dwarf from the mining region. After
wandering as a mercenary and leaving his hometown,
he decided to live as an adventurer."
24.help2:
"His axe is called the <Axe of Evil>, and it can
attack with a cursed attribute. He himself is an
extremely sturdy warrior and will protect his
comrades as a vanguard."
24.help3:
"He is shrewd and does not miss any opportunity
for a follow-up attack. The <Opportunity Strike>
is timed to follow up with Sol's breath."

25.name: Elaine
25.help1:
"The ice and snow sorceress Elaine is a wizard
who, like Gurestoras, graduated from the Magic
Academy. Always calm and polite, her appearance
also makes her quite popular among women."
25.help2:
"My specialty spell is <Frozen Storm>. It's a
group magic with the ice attribute. It has a
tremendous effect on enemies weak to cold."
25.help3:
"Furthermore, <Time Freeze> is a powerful magic
that freezes the opponent's time, causing them to
skip their turn. Let's make good use of it."

26.name: Borschtman
26.help1:
"Borschtman is a priest who serves the god of
travel and wind, Folle... He's a very unique
individual."
26.help2:
"The spell <Snake Staff> does just as the name
suggests, turning a staff into a snake to attack
the enemy. Its effect is... something like that.
Oh, his snake mace has the unique attribute of
acid poison, making it distinctive."
26.help3:
"He's, um... how should I put it... a bit hard to
evaluate, but if you like unique adventurers, why
not consider making him a companion?"

27.name: Seres
27.help1:
"Seres is a beautiful elven woman who serves as a
priestess devoted to the earth mother goddess and
holds the role of acting auditor of the
adventurer's guild. She is childhood friends with
Wayne."
27.help2:
"Despite her appearance, she is a simple and
sturdy woman who wields a spear and shield. With
the <Great Holy Shield>, she can withstand even
the most powerful enemy attacks."
27.help3:
"Overall, she excels in defense as a rear guard.
It's appropriate to have an adventurer with high
attack power as a partner. Let's conserve our
fighting strength wisely."

28.name: Agni
28.help1:
"The lizardman Agni is a swamp warrior who has
traveled this far in search of the dragon he
serves. Despite being a lizardman, he is sociable
and gentle, easily blending into human society."
28.help2:
"With the toughest scales and armor, he constantly
reduces physical attack damage. However, due to
the weakness of cold-blooded creatures, he is
vulnerable to cold."
28.help3:
"Furthermore, as a member of the race that serves
dragons, he also possesses a skill to hasten Sol's
breath charge turn. This allows for boosting the
party's combat capabilities."

29.name: Wayne
29.help1:
"Wayne is a battle mage who has mastered many
offensive spells. He is aggressive and quick to
fight, but in battle, he is a reliable adventurer
who coldly assesses the situation. By the way, he
may be dark-skinned, but he is not a dark elf."
29.help2:
"He's all about offense. He focuses solely on
attacking with the preemptive strike spell
<Ignition>, the powerful group-targeting spell
<Explosion>, and the follow-up attack <Detonation>
when using breath attacks."
29.help3:
"However, she herself is very weak and has almost
no durability. It would be good to include an
adventurer skilled in defense as support when
using her."

30.name: Azusa
30.help1:
"Azusa is a samurai who hails from a distant
eastern country. She captivates people with her
highly unique appearance. She has mastered a
mysterious sword technique called Horyu, and the
intimidation of her blade is unmatched by any
other."
30.help2:
"Her secret technique <Void Slash> truly cuts
through all creation with a single stroke. Against
this sword, no armor or shield holds any meaning."
30.help3:
"However, in order to unleash this sword
technique, it requires a considerable amount of
time to focus one's energy. Let's use skill
charging methods in addition to her
<Concentration> skill."

31.name: Feril
31.help1:
"Feril is the only adventurer in this neighborhood
who holds the title of Lord. There are many
speculations about the reason, but she does not
speak about it. She is receiving warm gazes from
Mark-kun, who aspires to become a Lord."
31.help2:
"The <Holy Strike> is a sacred attribute attack
that pulverizes evil beings in a single blow, but
be careful as it has a long charge time."
31.help3:
"The <Diamond Shield> is the shield of the Diamond
Knight. It heals your health before activating the
Dragon Breath. If you are going to engage in
breath-based battles, there is no doubt that you
should use her."

32.name: Ruby
32.help1:
"Ruby is a half-demon... a tiefling who, through
her faith, became a bishop. Despite her
mischievous personality, behavior, and appearance,
she has a kind nature."
32.help2:
"In battle, she uses abilities that harness the
power of her demon blood. She excels in tactics
that deplete her own camp's health to charge
skills, and then uses <Dark Grasp> to steal the
enemy's health."
32.help3:
"Furthermore, <Death's Touch> can weaken the enemy
with a curse. With battle prowess befitting of a
bishop, she will be able to dominate the
battlefield."

33.name: Hayagake
33.help1:
"Hayagake is a ninja who drifted from the eastern
country. She is still on a journey of training and
has become an adventurer to hone her skills. It
seems that the reason for being naked is that it
makes it easier to avoid attacks."
33.help2:
"She conceals her presence with stealth at the
start of battle, gaining an advantage. Then, with
<Deadly Blow>, she can bring enemies to their
demise with a single unarmed strike."
33.help3:
"Hiring him will require a large amount of gold
coins, but his skills will undoubtedly be worth
the amount paid."

34.name: Eni-sensei
34.help1:
"Eni Turaia, the sage beloved by the god of travel
and wind, Folle. She is said to be a member of the
adventurers who saved the world from destruction
ten years ago."
34.help2:
"I may not be able to use magic, but I fully
utilize the true silver sword, the wisdom of a
sage, and a multitude of magic rings to play a
versatile role on the battlefield."
34.help3:
"However, she has a wandering habit and tends to
become mentally distressed if she stays in one
place for too long. Let's try to include her in
the party and take her around as much as possible.
Otherwise...?"
